thought: I need to craft a bone_block. The recipe requires 9 bone_meal in a 3x3 grid. I have 9 bone_meal in slot 43, so I will start by moving 1 bone_meal to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
